document.full_text: israel's parliament passed a measure on tuesday enabling the denial of state funding to institutions that question the country's existence as a jewish state, in a move criticized as targeting an arab minority.
document.title: israel passes law against mourning its existence
lines_and_colors: israel's parliament passed a measure on tuesday enabling the denial of state funding to institutions that question the country's existence as a jewish state, in a move criticized as targeting an arab minority.
